subject: Delivery update
description_text:
Hi, 

Just wondering why my order has gone from China to America, when I live in England (United Kingdom) Please let me know. 

Thanks,
Philip. 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Philip Andrews,     This is your logistics tracking link, and it is correct. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047079990508
